question:
You are planning to go on a holiday in an English-speaking country where one of your friend resides. Please write him a letter and let him know about the upcoming trip. In your letter;
- Ask for recommendations for place to visit during your trip.
- Ask about accommodations.
- Advice on program that you and your friend can do together once you will meet him
text: Hope this letter finds you in radiant health and best of spirits. I am writing to let you know about my upcoming trip to Canada. Actually, I have 15 days of vacation applies next month and I am planning to visit your country between September 15th to 28th September.

Let me explain my situation, this will be my first visit to the foreign country and personally I don't know much more about it. It will be really helpful if you provide me some information regarding Canadian culture and few tourist places. I am also wondering about the accommodation and also give me advice about stay near tourist place. So I can easily manage everything over there.
Would you kindly, able to take days off at that time. Because I wanna spend some quality of time with you. We can also enjoy some of your favourite water activities on the beach and enjoy farries.
